title: "California’s Plus, German Truck Giant Test Self-Driving Runs Between Dallas and San Antonio"
excerpt: "Silicon Valley-based autonomous driving startup Plus has announced a partnership with brands of the Munich-based TRATON GROUP. The partners say they're already testing self-driving trucking runs between Dallas and Houston with a safety driver on board—and more runs are coming \"in the Texas triangle and I-10 corridor."
